newsitem.title: UK: NWE naphtha firms with aggressive trader bidding.
newsitem.headline: NWE naphtha firms with aggressive trader bidding.

text.p: NWE naphtha firmed on Wednesday with one trading house a particularly aggressive bidder.
The trading house was bidding at $184 for a pipeline spec cargo for May 24-June 5 delivery. An offer was seen at $185 for slightly earlier dates.
"The market is tight for bigger cargoes, but smaller parcels are still around for May," said one trader.
A 14,000 tonne Russian cargo was sold to a Dutch trader at $178.50 a tonne cif NWE.
Strong bidding on the prompt market narrowed the contango with the May/June spread firming to around -$2.75 a tonne.
